name: Shubham Kushwah
title: Full-Stack Developer & System Architect
summary: Full-Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience building fast, accessible, and SEO-friendly web applications using React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, and Express. Strong in UI/UX engineering, accessibility (WCAG/ARIA), REST APIs, and database development with MongoDB and MySQL. Skilled in performance optimization, SSR/SSG, and integrating AI-assisted tools (GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT API, Figma AI, Vercel AI SDK) to accelerate development and improve product quality.

highlights: Designed and implemented responsive, accessible front-end solutions for government platforms serving large user bases.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define requirements, perform code reviews, and deliver secure, scalable applications.
Focused on performance and accessibility, improving rendering and user experience for critical pages.
Developed and optimized RESTful APIs and integrated them into Angular-based front ends, reducing load times and boosting engagement.
Implemented microservices architecture to improve scalability and reliability.
Delivered SSR/SSG solutions to improve SEO and built automated test suites with Jest & Cypress.
Built and maintained e-commerce websites using WordPress, Bootstrap, and custom JavaScript, increasing sales and conversions.
Enhanced real-time data rendering using AJAX and jQuery and reduced page load times by leveraging lazy loading and CDN strategies.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science Engineering
education.institution: Hindustan College of Science & Technology, Mathura
